about_the_game:
You're a merchant who've just managed to land a good deal for a building on the side of main road to the City of Poslor, right before the city's wall. This purchase however gives quite a heavy blow to your chest fund, but the potential profit is unimaginable. With little left on your pocket you decided to open a restaurant, food business is well known to have a good profit margin after all.

Features

Source ingredients by knowing locals around you!

who knows, after getting on their good side, they might give you special discount or sell item they don't put on display

Cook and sell your food

you are what you eat, your customers are mostly adventurers and their stat growth will be affected by your food.

Join on quests!

good food brings up troop's morale, with enough reputation you can apply to join as army's field cook.

name: Poslor City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: none

short_description: Play as an Innkeeper in a fantasy world !
